Key Match Events: Zimbabwe beat Pakistan by a single run at Perth on October 27, 2022.
Pakistan were in control at 88-3 in the 14th over but finished at 129-8 at the end of their 20 overs.
Shadab Khan took 3-23 with his wrist spin.
Zimbabwe's Wesley Madhevere and Craig Ervine had a 42-run stand.
Shaheen Afridi's shot off the final ball resulted in a single, leading to a run-out and Zimbabwe's win.
Zimbabwe elected to bat first and were held to a below-par total.
